attributes.action: Stop giving financial aid to India (£825million!!)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
India have just successfully launched a satellite-and good on them too!

However, if India can afford to fund a space program, then there is no reason on this planet why our taxpayer funds should be given to them as 'poverty aid'.  

The £825 million destined for India under this plan should be re-pumped into our own economy which, as you've probably seen on the news Mr Brown isn't doing so well.

Why are taxpayer funds being sent overseas when we need them here, to sort out our own problems?  £825 million would go a long way for our own schools, hospitals and local communities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
